name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior QA Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications and robust testing frameworks. Proficient in **Python**, **JavaScript**, **REST API**, and experienced in testing tools such as **PyTest**, **Playwright**, and **TestRail**. Demonstrated expertise in leveraging **Azure Pipelines** and **Azure DevOps** for continuous integration and delivery, ensuring high software quality through consistent testing practices.
Strong background in project management tools like **Jira** and version control with **Git**, complemented by hands-on experience utilizing **Active Directory**, **Cosmos DB**, and **MongoDB** for comprehensive testing environments.
Committed to aligning testing strategies with industry standards and compliance requirements, focusing on improving scalability and reliability of applications while utilizing tools like **Datadog** for monitoring and performance optimization. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver seamless software solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and executed comprehensive testing strategies using **PyTest** and **Playwright** to ensure high-quality deliverables across various platforms.
- Created automated test cases for **REST API** endpoints and full-stack applications, utilizing tools such as **Git** and **Azure DevOps** for efficient version control and integration.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and document test requirements using **Jira** and **TestRail**, ensuring alignment with project goals and timelines.
- Implemented continuous testing practices within **Azure Pipelines** to facilitate rapid feedback loops, achieving a reduction in bug detection time by **30%**.
- Led performance testing initiatives using **Datadog**, focusing on API response times and system reliability under high load conditions, managing scalability testing for **8+** different deployment environments.
- Conducted manual and automated testing of databases leveraging **MongoDB** and **Cosmos DB**, ensuring data integrity and optimal performance across multiple use cases.
- Ensured compliance with security standards by participating in review sessions for Active Directory configurations and user access management.
- Participated in sprint planning and retrospective meetings, using agile methodologies to prioritize testing efforts and enhance team collaboration and responsiveness.
- Provided actionable insights and recommendations based on testing outcomes to improve development processes and reduce regression rates by **25%**.
- Engaged in continuous learning and improvement of testing tools and practices to adapt to new technologies and methodologies within the QA landscape.

Ensured high-quality software delivery by developing automated testing frameworks using **Python** and **JavaScript**, enhancing test coverage for various applications.
Executed comprehensive test plans for REST APIs, utilizing tools like **PyTest** and **Playwright** to validate functionality and performance.
Collaborated with development teams through **Azure DevOps** to integrate testing into continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, resulting in a **30%** decrease in release cycle time.
Utilized **Datadog** for monitoring application performance and error tracking, leading to a **25%** improvement in issue resolution times.
Managed test case documentation and tracking through **TestRail** and **Jira**, enhancing team visibility and accountability in quality assurance processes.
Conducted API testing and performance validation with automated scripts, ensuring compliance with specifications and reducing manual testing efforts by **40%**.
Participated in code reviews and provided feedback to developers, fostering a culture of quality and accountability within the agile team environment.
Maintained effective communication with team members in the **Azure Pipelines** environment to ensure the timely execution and reporting of tests, contributing to overall project success.

Developed and executed comprehensive test strategies for backend services developed in **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **JavaScript** (Node.js, NestJS, Express), utilizing **PyTest** and **Playwright** for automated testing to ensure high quality and performance across all modules.

Conducted performance testing for frontend applications using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, ensuring compliance with **WCAG 2.1** for accessibility, and optimizing user experiences across both web and mobile platforms.
Executed database testing and validation with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Cassandra**, ensuring data integrity and fast access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows, while caching frequent queries with **Redis**.

Created comprehensive test documentation in **TestRail** and coordinated with cross-functional teams using **Jira** to enhance collaboration and track project progress in aligning with quality standards.

Ensured proper access control through role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, validating compliance with **GDPR** guidelines in data security and user privacy protocols.
